text: Arthur choked on his beer, leapt to his feet and stood resolutely facing the opposite direction.

passages.fragment: Arthur choked on his beer , leapt to his feet
passages.full_quote: <used>Arthur choked on his beer, leapt to his feet</used>

passages.fragment: leapt to his feet and stood
passages.full_quote: Dirk <used>leapt to his feet and stood</used> blinking for a moment

passages.fragment: to his feet and stood resolutely facing the opposite direction
passages.full_quote: He jacked himself up <used>to his feet and stood resolutely facing the opposite direction</used>
